problems.title: Sum Of Even Or Odd
problems.description: Write a Java program to calculate the sum of even and odd numbers in a given array. Print "Sum of Even: X" and "Sum of Odd: Y" on separate lines.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5
1 2 3 4 5

Sample Output
Sum of Even: 6
Sum of Odd: 9

testCases.expectedOutput:
Sum of Even: 6
Sum of Odd: 9

Sum of Even: 12
Sum of Odd: 0

Sum of Even: 0
Sum of Odd: 9

Sum of Even: -2
Sum of Odd: 0

Sum of Even: 10
Sum of Odd: 0
